attributes.background: a couple of years ago, 3 in 1s were taken away from all us smokers due to leaving the EU. after leaving the EU, all cigarette packages were changed and 10 packs of cigarettes were unable to be bought. we are now all stuck in an expensive cycle of paying £10 for a back of 20. #BRINGBACKAMBERLEAF3IN1

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the UK Parliament and Government.
